charges.charge_description: 18:371 and 1956(a)(3)-Conspiracy to launder monetary instruments with intent to promote the buying, selling and dealing of narcotics and controlled substances and to avoid transaction reporting requirements-Penalty-Up to five years and/or not more than $250,000.00. (1s)
